nodes.text: The "AT-AT" SpecPlate is a rare fine-art print produced by Acme Archives Direct. It depicts the technical schematics of the All Terrain Armored Transport walker. The 3-D model for the AT-AT itself required 25 set pieces for creation. The image was 36" × 17", and 43" × 24" when framed. The model was colored in gold aluminum that was designed by a group of architects in Seattle that were affiliated with the United States Navy. It was mounted in 2" polished stainless steel standoffs on a supporting plate in a shadow box frame. Like all SpecPlates, it came with a Certificate of Authenticity.
